sentences.sContent: There were frowzy fields, and cow-houses, and dunghills, and dustheaps, and ditches, and gardens, and summer-houses, and carpet-beating grounds, at the very door of the Railway.
sentences.sContent_eng: There were frowzy fields, and cow-houses, and dunghills, and dustheaps, and ditches, and gardens, and summer-houses, and carpet-beating grounds, at the very door of the Railway.
sentences.sCn: 在铁路线开始的地方有霉臭难闻的田野、牛棚、粪堆、垃圾堆、水沟、菜园、凉亭和敲打地毯的场地。

synos.tran: 不整洁的（等于frowsy）；有臭味的；霉臭的

remMethod.val: 和frown (v. 皱眉) 一起记， 看到不整洁的 (frowzy) 就皱眉 (frown) → 不整洁的

words.tran: 霉臭的；难闻的；不整洁的（等于frowzy）

trans.tranCn: 不整洁的（等于frowsy）；有臭味的；霉臭的
